zone.line: Break the dance, & scatter the song
We, beyond Heaven, are driven along--
Us the inchantments of Earth retain--
With the Spirits which build a new earth
And a Heaven where yet Heaven cd. never be--
146 With the Powers of a world of perfect light--
We whirl, singing loud, round the gathering sphere
Till the trees & the beasts, & the clouds appear
From its chaos made calm by love, not fear{--}
We encircle the Oceans & Mountains of Earth
And the happy forms of its death & birth
Change [to] the music of our sweet mirth
